definitions.definition: A kind of cutting tool, used to cut the teeth of a gear .
( historical ) The flat projection or iron shelf at the side of a fire grate, where things are put to be kept warm.
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) The top cooking surface on a cooker; a cooktop . It typically comprises several cooking elements (often four), also known as 'rings'.
A rounded peg used as a target in several games, especially in quoits .

main_definition: A kind of cutting tool, used to cut the teeth of a gear .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) The flat projection or iron shelf at the side of a fire grate, where things are put to be kept warm.
( UK , Ireland , Commonwealth ) The top cooking surface on a cooker; a cooktop . It typically comprises several cooking elements (often four), also known as 'rings'.
A rounded peg used as a target in several games, especially in quoits .

definitions.definition: A fairy ; a sprite ; an elf ; a bogey .
A countryman ; a rustic or yokel .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A fairy ; a sprite ; an elf ; a bogey .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A countryman ; a rustic or yokel .
